function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data collected from convenience sample of students may not be representative of broader population, limiting generalizability of study results.","Impact":"Inaccurate or unreliable study results that do not apply to the broader population.","Mitigation":"Use a representative sample for verification, collect data from a larger and more diverse population.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Sample size of 124 observations may not be sufficient for conducting cross-validation analysis to ascertain the stability of the cluster structure.","Impact":"Unstable or unreliable cluster structure due to small sample size.","Mitigation":"Collect more data to increase sample size for cross-validation analysis.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Limited scope of data collection within the U.S. and lack of data from other countries may limit the robustness of the three-cluster solution.","Impact":"Study results may not account for wide differences in pandemic responses and cultural approaches outside the U.S.","Mitigation":"Collect more data from outside the U.S. to check the robustness of the three-cluster solution.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of incorporation of individual difference variables, such as uncertainty avoidance and information avoidance tendency, in the EPPM.","Impact":"Limitations in identifying boundary conditions for the effects and relationships predicted by the theory.","Mitigation":"Expand the EPPM by incorporating individual difference variables.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"}]}
